Class CBORByteArray

java.lang.Object
com.authlete.cbor.CBORItem
com.authlete.cbor.CBORValue<byte[]>
com.authlete.cbor.CBORByteArray
Direct Known Subclasses:
COSEProtectedHeader
public class CBORByteArray extends CBORValue<byte[]>
CBOR byte array (major type = 2).

The CBORValue.getValue() method of this class returns an instance of byte array (byte[]).

See Also:
  • RFC 8949, 3.1. Major Types

    A constructor with the value and the list of CBOR items represented by the byte array.

      The list of CBOR items represented by this byte string.
      Since:

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Return h'{base64}', or <<{CBOR data item(s)}>> if the value can be decoded as a CBOR data item or CBOR data items.
      Overrides:
      toString in class CBORValue<byte[]>
      See Also:
      • RFC 8949, 8. Diagnostic Notation

    • toString

      protected String toString(Number tagNumber)
      Description copied from class: CBORItem
      Get the string representation of this CBOR item. The default implementation of this method calls the toString() method.

      This method is called by the implementation of the CBORTaggedItem class.

      Overrides:
      toString in class CBORItem
      Parameters:
      tagNumber - The tag number prepended to this CBOR item.
      Returns:
      The string representation of this CBOR item.

    • toString

      public String toString(boolean decode)
      Get the string representation of this byte string.
      Parameters:
      decode - true to try to decode the content as CBOR data item(s). false to try not to decode the content.
      Returns:
      The string representation of this byte string.
      Since:
      1.1

    • prettify

      protected String prettify(String indent, String indentUnit, Number tagNumber)
      Description copied from class: CBORItem
      Stringify this CBOR item and all the nested CBOR items in the pretty format.

      Subclasses should override this method as necessary.

      Overrides:
      prettify in class CBORItem
      Parameters:
      indent - The indent inherited from the upper CBOR item.
      indentUnit - Additional indent that should be added when nested CBOR items are stringified.
      tagNumber - The tag number of the tag wrapping this CBOR item. If this CBOR item is not wrapped, null is passed.
      Returns:
      The string expression of this CBOR item and all the nested CBOR items.

      Description copied from class: CBORItem
      Write the CBOR representation of this instance into the output stream.
      Specified by:
      encode in class CBORItem
      Parameters:
      outputStream - The output stream to write the CBOR representation into.
